meta.title: Designed for Everyday Living
meta.subtitle: A thoughtfully planned community that balances comfort, connectivity, and long-term value
meta.tagline: Where location, layout, and lifestyle come together

summary.description: ?Paradise on Earth?, located in Gangasandra, is surrounded by 2,190 acres of lush green reserve forests, right in the lap of nature. Paradise on Earth is Bengaluru?s first sustainable villa community. Spread across 24 acres of pristine land Paradise on Earth offers 219 tastefully designed villas. The density is just 9 villas per acre which ensures plenty of open spaces with well landscaped parks & plantations. Paradise on Earth has IGBC Platinum rating pre-certification.
highlights: Bengaluru?s first IGBC Platinum pre-certified sustainable villa community, set amid 2,190 acres of protected reserve forest in Gangasandra
Ultra-low density living with just 219 villas across 24 acres ? only 9 villas per acre, ensuring space, privacy, and quiet
Private garden villas with 350?450 sq.ft. exclusive garden & deck, extending your home into nature
Inspired by old-gold Bengaluru living ? leafy lanes, open skies, cross-ventilated homes, and a slower, calmer rhythm of life
A rare balance of nature and connectivity ? green horizons at home, essential destinations within easy reach
Designed for families who value space, sustainability, and long-term legacy, not crowded layouts or high-rise living
Phase 2 of a thoughtfully planned villa enclave, where mornings feel lighter and everyday living feels unhurried
Forest-side villa living surrounded by 2,190 acres of reserve green cover

meta.title: The Perfect Setting
meta.subtitle: Everything you need within easy reach ? schools, hospitals, connectivity & more.

categories.title: Seamless Connectivity
items: Just 10 minutes to Kanakapura Road & Mysore Road
15 minutes to key Metro stations including Silk Institute & Challaghatta
Quick access to NICE Road, simplifying cross-city travel
Kengeri Railway Station within 20 minutes for regional connectivity

categories.title: Education @ your doorstep
items: BGS International Residential School just 1 minute away
Multiple leading international & ICSE schools within 6?17 minutes
Reputed institutions like DPS, Christ School, Gopalan National School close by
Alternative & holistic schools such as Valley School and Sri Sri Ravishankar Vidya Mandir within easy reach
A rare advantage for families seeking short school commutes without compromising on quality

categories.title: Colleges & Higher Education Nearby
items: Indian Institute of Journalism just 2 minutes away ? rare academic proximity
Vivekananda Institute of Technology within 6 minutes
Strong cluster of engineering, medical & business colleges within 15?30 minutes
Easy access to reputed institutions like Don Bosco Institute of Technology and Rajarajeshwari Medical College
Prestigious universities including RV College of Engineering, National School of Indian University & Bangalore University within comfortable commute
Ideal for families planning long-term education needs without relocation

categories.title: Close to Work. Far from the Rush
items: Seamless access to Global Village Tech Park and key industrial corridors
Connectivity to Electronic City without sacrificing green, low-density living
Workdays stay productive ? home life stays calm, private, and unrushed

categories.title: Healthcare & Emergency Access
items: Quality healthcare within minutes, with hospitals close to home
BMS Hospital just ~7 minutes away for everyday and emergency care
Rajarajeshwari Medical College & Hospital nearby, offering multi-specialty treatment
Access to Ayurveda and holistic care at Sri Sri Ayurveda Hospital
Renowned healthcare networks like BGS Gleneagles and Apollo within comfortable reach
A location that offers calm living without compromising medical access

categories.title: Recreation, Leisure & Retail
items: A curated leisure circuit with resorts, sports clubs, and golf destinations close by
Guhantara Arts & Sports Club and Holiday Village Resort for relaxed weekends and family outings
Wonderla Amusement Park and Eagleton Golf Resort within an easy drive for recreation and retreats
Access to premium malls like Mantri Arena, Prestige Forum & Gopalan Arcade
Enjoy the luxury of choice?weekend escapes, fine dining, retail therapy?all without city chaos
A lifestyle where entertainment is nearby, yet everyday living remains calm and private

categories.title: Comfort & Convenience
items: Everyday essentials and lifestyle destinations within effortless reach
Decathlon and sports foundations nearby for an active, wellness-driven lifestyle
Proximity to Art of Living International Center for mindfulness, retreats, and holistic living
Close to Turahalli Reserve Forest, offering nature walks, cycling, and fresh air escapes
Spiritual and cultural landmarks like ISKCON Theme Park and Pyramid Valley within easy access
A neighborhood that balances urban convenience with restorative living

meta.title: What Our Customers Say
meta.subtitle: Hear from families living here
meta.tagline: Real stories from families who chose to live here.

testimonials.name: Sahana Bichugatti
testimonials.quote: Beautiful sustainable villas which are solar powered and they do rain water harvesting for the entire community water supply. Situated in-between kanakapura and Mysore road. Little bit far from the city but well connected to metro and nice road . Another plus point is reputed schools and colleges are near by to this project . Vedaprabhu explained the project details clearly . Bangalore needs these kind of sustainable villas for our future generation. Must visit if anyone wants to purchase a villa in south Bangalore..

testimonials.name: Anjali Gowda
testimonials.quote: During my visit to the Urbanrise villa at Gangasandra, Bangalore found the property to be truly outstanding and outclass. The design, finish and landscaping reflect premium craftsmanship, while the amenities (clubhouse, fitness centre, swimming pool and well-planned open spaces) exceeded expectations. The business executive Mr.Deepak GM who guided the tour was professional, knowledgeable and transparent ? making the entire experience smooth and reassuring. Highly recommended. An outstanding, outclass villa experience ? superb finishes, exceptional amenities and a business executive who truly understands client needs.

testimonials.name: Abhishek C
testimonials.quote: Feels very close to nature , this place is planned with lot of greener concept and has a good water source , Mr.Satya Raghuram wonderfully explained this concept and has helped us in selecting our dream house. Would recommend this project for people seeking calm nature and a peaceful pollution free life.

testimonials.name: Ranjith Kadamboor
testimonials.quote: This is a nature-friendly and dust-free area with wide roads and plenty of space between each villa. The villas are beautifully designed with sustainability in mind, incorporating solar power and a rainwater harvesting system for water supply. Conveniently located between Kanakapura Road and Mysore Road, this community is well-connected to all areas.

testimonials.name: Chandramouli Rao
testimonials.quote: Great project backed by great set of people. I don?t think anyone who visit the site and meet the individual staff there, would not want to seriously look into buying a property here. Clean legal documents and several sensible and satisfied customers who already call Urbanrise their home, makes it a compelling proposition. Their customer interaction practice both at the site and at the corporate office is highly professional. Price is a bit on the higher side but looking on the ground infrastructure you can think differently.

aboutBuilder.name: urbanrise

meta.title: About the Developer
meta.subtitle: A trusted name with a proven track record in delivering quality homes
meta.tagline: Built on credibility. Known for consistency.

aboutBuilder.description: Urbanrise is South India?s largest real estate developer, recognized for its pathbreaking and quality residential projects across South India. Backed by the renowned Alliance Group, Urbanrise has delivered over 22,000+ homes and has 72 million square feet under development. Driven by a passion for growth and sustainability, our projects are not just about creating homes but building communities that foster a sense of belonging. With a commitment to integrity and reliability, Urbanrise ensures timely delivery, meeting and exceeding home buyer expectations.
aboutBuilder.descriptionExpanded: Urbanrise Vision is to be the World?s largest real estate developer with annual revenues of $10 Billion by year 2035. Thus bringing pride to our country that they have conquered yet another industry.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions
meta.subtitle: Everything you need to know before making a decision

faqs.title: Where is Urbanrise Paradise on Earth located?
items: Urbanrise Paradise on Earth is located in Gangasandra, Bengaluru, surrounded by reserve forests and low-density residential zones, offering a nature-first villa lifestyle with good city connectivity.

faqs.title: What type of project is Paradise on Earth?
items: It is a premium villa community featuring independent villas designed for spacious, private, and sustainable living.

faqs.title: Is Paradise on Earth a gated community?
items: Yes, Paradise on Earth is a gated villa community with controlled access and internal roads designed for privacy and safety.

faqs.title: How large is the project and how many villas are there?
items: The project is spread across approximately 24 acres and offers 219 villas, maintaining a low density of about 9 villas per acre.

faqs.title: What makes Paradise on Earth a low-density project?
items: With only around 9 villas per acre, the project prioritizes open spaces, landscaped parks, and wide internal roads instead of high construction density.

faqs.title: What is meant by Bengaluru?s first sustainable villa community?
items: Paradise on Earth focuses on eco-conscious planning, large green cover, open spaces, and has received IGBC Platinum pre-certification for sustainability.

faqs.title: Does the project have any green certification?
items: Yes, Urbanrise Paradise on Earth has IGBC Platinum pre-certification, reflecting its focus on sustainable and environmentally responsible development.

faqs.title: Do villas come with private gardens?
items: Yes, each villa includes a private garden of approximately 350?450 sq. ft. with a deck, offering personal outdoor living space.

faqs.title: What lifestyle does Paradise on Earth offer?
items: The project is designed for families seeking quiet, spacious living with greenery, private gardens, and a community that reflects the charm of old Bengaluru.

faqs.title: Is Paradise on Earth suitable for families?
items: Yes, it is ideal for families looking for spacious homes, private gardens, proximity to schools, and a calm, secure environment.

faqs.title: How far is Paradise on Earth from Electronic City?
items: Electronic City is approximately 41 minutes away, making it accessible for professionals while retaining a peaceful residential environment.

faqs.title: How well is the project connected to major roads?
items: The project has good access to Kanakapura Road, Mysore Road, NICE Road Junction, and upcoming metro connectivity in the region.

faqs.title: Are there metro stations nearby?
items: Yes, Silk Institute Metro Station and Challaghatta Metro Station are within a short driving distance from the project.

faqs.title: What schools are near Paradise on Earth?
items: Several reputed schools such as BGS International Residential School, Delhi Public School, and Christ School Kengeri are located within driving distance.

faqs.title: Are colleges and universities accessible from the project?
items: Yes, institutions like RV College of Engineering, National School of Indian University, and Bangalore University are reachable within 30 minutes.

faqs.title: What healthcare facilities are nearby?
items: Hospitals such as BMS Hospital, Rajarajeshwari Medical College & Hospital, and BGS Gleneagles Global Hospital are accessible from the project.

faqs.title: Does the project offer a peaceful environment despite city access?
items: Yes, being close to reserve forests and low-density development zones, the project offers quiet surroundings while staying connected to key city hubs.

faqs.title: Is Paradise on Earth suitable for people who value nature and open spaces?
items: Absolutely. The project is surrounded by greenery and designed with large open spaces, landscaped parks, and forest-adjacent surroundings.

faqs.title: What recreational options are nearby?
items: Destinations like Guhantara Arts & Sports Club, Wonderla, Eagleton Golf Resort, and major malls are accessible within a short drive.

faqs.title: Who is the developer of Paradise on Earth?
items: Urbanrise is the developer behind Paradise on Earth, known for large-scale residential developments across South India.
